data.lyric:
[ti:Weightless]
[ar:Infernal]
[al:Weightless]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Weightless - Infernal
[00:03.66]Written by：Johan Giele/Paw Lagermann/Engelina Andrina/Lina Rafn/Sven Maes
[00:07.32]This boy makes me drunk tonight
[00:09.38]
[00:10.80]Just one word and it sends me right into outer space
[00:15.40]This boy makes me feel alive
[00:18.12]
[00:18.64]You got me like I'm in a haze
[00:21.20]
[00:23.01]Got me skiing on a feeling
[00:24.55]I'm weightless like I'm weightless under you
[00:28.60]I feel wasted right out of the blue
[00:32.66]Yeah I'm weightless like a burdens off my shoulders
[00:37.03]It's crazy
[00:38.89]
[00:40.30]And gravity cannot hold on me
[00:41.88]
[00:42.82]No hold on me
[00:44.01]

[00:45.97]
[00:46.56]No hold and gravity cannot hold on me
[00:50.23]

[00:52.33]

[00:54.37]

[00:56.06]
